Qoder Experience

VitePress i18n Debug

On this page

Today's Qoder Experience ​

Introduction ​

Today I had an excellent experience using Qoder to assist with developing a VitePress documentation project. As an AI-assisted programming tool, Qoder has demonstrated its powerful capabilities in multiple aspects.

Project Initialization Experience ​

Qoder helped me quickly understand the basic structure of this VitePress project. It accurately identified the project's directory structure, tech stack (VitePress 2.0.0-alpha.15, esbuild 0.27.2, Rollup 4.56.0, Babel 7.28.6), and the main features of the project.

Documentation Internationalization ​

The most impressive part was Qoder's handling of documentation internationalization. It not only accurately translated content in multiple locations such as navigation bar, sidebar, and home page, but also maintained the structural integrity of the configuration files. The entire process included:

  • Modifying navigation and sidebar text in config.mts
  • Updating home page content while maintaining Chinese-English alignment
  • Ensuring all links and paths remain valid

Menu Extension Capabilities ​

Qoder demonstrated excellent systematic thinking when adding the "Random" menu:

  • Updated both navigation bar and sidebar in config.mts
  • Created corresponding directory structure and sample documents
  • Maintained overall navigation consistency and logic

Configuration File Analysis ​

Qoder has a deep understanding of VitePress configuration files and can:

  • Explain in detail the purpose of each configuration item in config.mts
  • Provide actual configuration examples
  • Explain the usage of advanced configuration options

Interface Localization Optimization ​

In terms of interface localization, Qoder not only translated visible menu text but also paid attention to details, such as changing "On this page" on the right side to "本页内容" (This page's content), demonstrating careful consideration of user experience.

Documentation Creation and Organization ​

Qoder demonstrated excellent documentation organization skills, creating clear and detailed document structures including:

  • Project operation manual
  • Configuration guide
  • Deployment guide
  • Today's usage experience summary

Summary ​

Today's experience with Qoder was excellent. It's not just a code editing assistant, but more like a collaborative partner with deep understanding capabilities. It can:

  1. Quickly understand project structure and context
  2. Precisely execute complex multi-step tasks
  3. Maintain consistency in code and documentation
  4. Provide high-quality Chinese localization support
  5. Create structured and easy-to-understand documentation

I look forward to continuing to use Qoder to assist with developing more projects in the future, believing it will become an indispensable intelligent assistant for developers.
